extendedInfo.description: Booster FREE is a permanently FREE app!The coolest task killer, battery saver & app manager for your Android mobile phone. It's easy and simple dashboard like interface saves battery life and optimizes system speed. All from a single view you can free system memory with a push of a button, control the WIFI, Bluetooth, Auto-Sync and Airplane mode, and get the deviceâs battery level/usage.Key Features:â¢	Optimize â Instantly frees memory.â¢	Battery Saver - save your battery via battery save mode and allow you to check your battery consumption.â¢	Task Killer â Single-handedly kill running apps.â¢       Permissions management for Android 4.3.â¢	App to SD - Move available apps from phone to SD card. Keep your Android device fast and clean! Show APP2SD Notification when movable apps are installedâ¢	Uninstaller - Uninstall apps you don't like;â¢	Cache Cleaner - Clear Cache to free more phone memory;â¢	Auto Optimization â Optimize every 15 minutes or up to 4 hours.Bonus Feature:â¢	Listen to music or radio before going to sleep and have it turn off automatically using the Timed Optimization feature.Booster FREE manages your phoneâs system, running apps and services while using less than 0.1% of your battery.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does a good job with making my battery last. Wish it did it on its own though.
reviews.author: Candy Juarez

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Frees a lot of memory. I\'m really glad I found this! Needs more tasks to do though!
reviews.author: Jan Osborne

reviews.title: what to do?
reviews.comment: clear history. nice u can select apps on installed on the phone & clear history function. prob i see.. u can select the app but no buttons to proceed or perform selected task. if not an issue. might\'ve been w/the size of the screen of my phone? app should automatically adjust its display. slide, drag, pinch& zoom tried all but no buttons or let say cant do what it should be doing
reviews.author: nhelly G

reviews.title: Keep asking for rate
reviews.comment: I am @ testing period, so I can\'t exactly judge , put to avoid noise asking for rate , I give 2
reviews.author: sherif adel

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s cool. Easy to use with wonderful display.
reviews.author: CHAN Charles

reviews.title: Helps save space and time with 3 in one tasks.
reviews.comment: Cool to look at too.
reviews.author: corey buckworth

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: Phenomenal UI, perfectly functional, easy on the battery. Nothing spectacular, does what it says. I like the ability to choose whether or not keep it in the notification bar Task killer could be tweaked, I would like to see different levels of task-killing (intense, moderate, light, etc.)
reviews.author: Daniel T.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: As soon as you kill apps and check again apps turn right back on. So it\'s not really killing them. It looks  cool and optimize button is cool how it frees up space.
reviews.author: Soliann Coleman

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Has me running faster!
reviews.author: Esquire Impotent

reviews.title: Really Really Super SWEET!
reviews.comment: I\'ve  probably downloaded at least half of the RAM/Memory Booster apps in the Play Store so far & I\'ve found this one is the BEST hands down, I love it! It works great,easy to use & doesn\'t drain memory,RAM,or drain the battery (like other apps). It has extra features allowing the user to empty the cashe,clear all app history or just individually from browser,text messages,Play Store,ext. It shows what apps u can move to ur SD card,allows u to delete APK\'s & more! Keep up the FANTASTIC WORK!!!
reviews.author: Cherie Thompson

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Does its work and qork very fast
reviews.author: Romualdo Alfonso

reviews.title: This turned out to be a decent app
reviews.comment: So many of these just do not work very well but this one works really good, I just wish that it worked with my tablet as well!
reviews.author: Dusty Snodgrass

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This a good app. Can\'t give it 5 stars yet, as i have just got it and i am trying it out but up to now excellent.
reviews.author: Alan Graham

reviews.title: Sue Dyson
reviews.comment: Give 5 star down load excellent.
reviews.author: Susan Dyson

reviews.title: Very good for being free
reviews.comment: Does what it says... clean UI. not very many options for advanced users however. Ad bar all up in your face... expected for it being free but still very annoying.  Galaxy S III
reviews.author: David Howell

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Superb
reviews.author: raju Chennuri

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t sure it was doing anything but lived with it for awhile, then deleted it for awhile. Phone ran better with it.
reviews.author: Jeff l

reviews.comment: Really like it works great
reviews.author: Barb Stephens

reviews.comment: User friend easy to navigate
reviews.author: Jay xanatos

reviews.title: Booster Task killer
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Works great!
reviews.author: William Foster
